description:
In this course you learn how to wake up at 5 in the morning. It's a practical habit that gives you the freedom and time to chase the vision you are after. Waking up early is probably one of the most valuable habits you can learn. It gives you self-respect, confidence and discipline. It gives you the time to truly express who you are.

Curious what I do in the early hours? Watch the free preview videos.

Muzaffar - Amazing value and inspiration. A very well made course, lot's of great videos that really communicate the content. Very well and authentically presented in a professional manner. For me personally it was very well worth it, I'm looking forward to improving my life, Would definitely recommend.

Matt - Honest and Authentic. I thought talking head video course will not be for me but this one is enjoying, practical and above all honest. My biggest successes were achieved by waking up early though I cannot change soon back to 5 AM as a husband and a father now. I will revert to earlier waking though and practical tips learned here will help me in that.

Master the Habit of Waking up Early by Learning Simple Strategies and Perspectives.

  • Recognize the potential of rising early;
  • Restructure your mental perspective on waking up early;
  • Deconstruct your own process of waking up;
  • Install a 'fail safe' to keep you motivated;
  • Learn the desire to go to sleep earlier;
  • Learn a simple mind game to wake up early;
  • Learn to actually enjoy waking up early.

Choose to have two hours of freedom every day. No boss to answer to, no responsibilities, but time to do what your heart desires to do.

We'll learn how the habit of waking up early can be broken down, and where exactly we can insert strategies and perspectives to change this habit. Accompanied by a view stories of successful people who woke up early, you'll learn the necessary skills to get this habit down. We will dive deeper than the general 'put your alarm clock on the other side of the room'-advice. We will learn how and where to steer our thoughts and emotions in the early morning and we will discover a new perspective on time.

Each of the lectures is easily understandable and applicable to your life. We will analyse different processes in your life, come up with morning activities. We will create of reasons and desires for you to wake up early.

So let's work together to get this habit down and build a small but dedicated community of learners and high achievers who want two hours of freedom to express their own vision in life.
title: How I Gain 2 Hours of Freedom by Waking up Early at 5 AM
